post:
Hello everyone
This is my first topic here,as a loyal LET/LEB reader,i learned alot and thank you all.
Also first offer from our brand PaulVPS.hope you folks will enjoy it.

==============================================

[PaulHost](http://paulhost.com/) has been providing shared hosting since Oct,2011.After several months fully preparation,we decided to launch [PaulVPS](http://paulvps.com) as our international VPS hosting brand,targetting at providing affordable and reliable virtualization solutions.

Our solutions offer services ranging from personal blogs to large enterprise business and forum communities. 

Utilizing the latest software and hardware technology to ensure top natch performance and stablity. 

We guatantee 99% uptime on our network so you can expect no unexpected downtime.

Features:

*All VPS are 99.9% uptime guaranteed,you can refer to our SLA.
*All VPS get at least 100Mbps network connection, no traffic overuse fee, the port speed will be limited to 10Mbps if exceed traffic limit.
*Each VPS get 1 free IPv4, aditional IPv4 available, $1.5 per one per month.
*Setup time: 0-24 hours.(depending on maxmind fraud checks)
*All VPS come with SolusVM control Panel so users can feel free to reboot or rebuild systems.We have tons of system template to choose from.

Payment Method accepted:
1.Paypal
2.Alipay



Packages:

VPS MINI (20 available)
128 MB Guarantee RAM 
256 MB Burstable RAM
10G RAID10 DISK
400G monthly bandwidth
1 IPv4 address
SolusVM Control Panel
Location: Los Angeles & Las Vegas & Scranton - USA
$20 per 6 months so that's around $3.3/m

West US: https://billing.paulvps.com/cart.php?a=confproduct&i=0
